title: IBM Cloud Activity Tracker Event Routing
introduction: Use IBM Cloud Activity Tracker Event Routing to configure how to route auditing events, both global and location-based event data, in your {IBM Cloud account. Audit events are critical data for security operations and a key element for meeting compliance requirements. Control of the storage location is critical to building enterprise-grade solutions.
